==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
<div style="float:right;">
{{wikipedia|lang=ja|硫黄島 (東京都)}}
{{wikipedia|Iwo Jima}}
</div>
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=irr|い|おう|とう}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=いおうとう|硫黄|tr1=iō|t1=sulfur|島|tr2=tō|t2=island}}.  This reading uses an irregular [[熟字訓#Japanese|jukujikun]] reading for {{m|ja|硫黄|tr=iō||sulfur}}, and the [[音読み|on'yomi]] for {{m|ja|島|tr=tō||island}}.

====Pronunciation====
* {{ja-pron|yomi=irr|いおうとう|acc=0}}

====Proper noun====
{{ja-pos|proper|いおうとう|hhira=いわうたう}}

# [[Iwo Jima]], [[Iōtō]], in the Ogasawara island chain

===Etymology 2===
<div style="float:right;">
{{wikipedia|lang=ja|硫黄島 (鹿児島県)}}
{{wikipedia|Iōjima (Kagoshima)}}
</div>
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=irr|い|おう|しま|k3=じま|r=y}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=いおうとう|硫黄|tr1=iō|t1=sulfur|島|tr2=tō|t2=island}}.  This reading uses an irregular [[熟字訓#Japanese|jukujikun]] reading for {{m|ja|硫黄|tr=iō||sulfur}}, and the [[訓読み|kun'yomi]] for {{m|ja|島|tr=shima||island}}.  {{rendaku2|sort=いおうじま|shima|jima}}

====Pronunciation====
* {{ja-pron|yomi=irr|いおうじま|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK}}

====Proper noun====
{{ja-pos|proper|いおうじま|hhira=いわうじま}}

# [[Iwo Jima]] in the Satsunan island of {{w|Kagoshima Prefecture}}
